ListVenues.summary: Multiple venue objects with selected fields.

location.description: The location of venue(s) you want a listing for.

results_per_page.description: The number of results you want per page/chunk.

page.description: The page/chunk of results to be requested.

incl_image.description: Decides whether or not a venue image is included in the response.

full_description.description: Decides whether full or summarised description text is included in the response.

updated_since.description: Only retrive venues that have been added/updated since the given date.

GetVenue.summary: A venue object with all fields.

id.description: Unique identifier string of the Venue you want full details for.

incl_events.description: Decides whether or not a list of events at this venue at is included in the response.

incl_images.description: Decides whether or not an venue images are included in the response.

incl_tickets.description: Decides whether or not a list of available tickets is included in the response.

full_description.description: Decides whether full or summarised description text is included in the response.

GetVenueImage.summary: A venue image retrieved as either a JSON object or JPEG image.

id.description: Unique identifier string of the Venue you want an image for.

format.description: The format of the response you want back from the resource
